content: वैदर्भः [विदर्भ-अण्] {@--1@} A king of Vidarbha. {@--2@} A gum-boil. --र्भं Crafty speech. --र्भीं {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Dams yantī. {@--2@} Of Rukmiṇī. {@--3@} A particular style of composition; thus defined in <ls>S. D.</ls>: --माधुर्यव्यंजकैर्वर्णै रचना ललितात्मिका . अवृत्तिरल्पवृत्तिर्वा वैदर्भी रीतिरिष्यते .. <ls n="S. D.">626.</ls> Daṇḍin very minutely distinguishes this style from the {%Gauḍīya%}; see <ls>Kāv. 1. 41-53</ls>. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Agastya.
